description_html:
Float is a capsule collection of refined lighting informed by glamorous design cues of a bygone era and defined by its soaring cylindrical form. The collection continues Articolo’s exploration of the richly storied nature of artisanship.

As creative director Nicci Green observes, “Nothing compares to the spirited detail of handcrafted production. It’s this nuanced skill that ensures each piece is uniquely individual, and uniquely Articolo.”
